name: Overbots
description:
Underbots are robots that cannot function without a music.
Overbots are robots that can function with or without a music.

In this game, you play as Shotbot, in quest to become the Ultimate Robot.
Kill Underbots while a music is playing for a gear or coin drops. Use gears and coins to buy an upgrade. Buy every upgrade to become the Ultimate Robot!

Made for the VimLark - 8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam (September 2020)
Focus: Collectables
Theme: There and Back
Optional Challenges:
1. Theme Party: Underground
2. In a Song: Robots will only function when a music is playing.
3. Hidden Secrets: Sold out and kill.

Controls:
A - move left
D - move right
Space - jump
Left click - spawn bullet
Right click - redirect bullet
